<div align="center">
I am a front end developer with 3+ years building B2B service platform with 100k+ users. Expert at turning complex business logic into manageable and modularized components. Adaptable to new technologies and unprecedented problems and requests. Strong and concise communication skills to gather information and convey thoughts.
</div>
